extendeduserprofiles-desc: MediaWiki-extension extending user-profiles for usage with the OHI-Tool
extendeduserprofiles-createaccount-birth: 4-character integer of your birthyear; detailed information about your not required by design
extendeduserprofiles-error-birthyear-too: Birthyears after the current year ({{#time:Y}}) are not supported
extendeduserprofiles-error-birthyear-emp: The field {{extendeduserprofiles-birthyear}} is required and can not be left empty
extendeduserprofiles-error-gender-empty: The field {{extendeduserprofiles-createaccount-gender}} is required and can not be left empty
extendeduserprofiles-error-highest-educa: The field {{extendeduserprofiles-createaccount-highest-educational-attainment}} is required and can not be left empty
extendeduserprofiles-error-couldnt-resol: Internal error, contact the developer about error-code 'extendeduserprofiles-error-couldnt-resolve-request'
Internal error, contact the developer about error-code 'extendeduserprofiles-error-couldnt-resolve-request-in-creation'
